hopobject.name: IM-002
hopobject.pname: Inti Media for Beaglebone - an expansion board for Beaglebone
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_2) AppleWebKit/537.11 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/23.0.1271.95 Safari/537.11
hopobject.body:
Inti Media for Beaglebone.

Proposed functionalities and properties:

  • high resolution LCD display with touch screen enabling to work with graphical user interface of the OS
  • size of the display 4-7 inch - TBD
  • Additional features available as standard or as optional add-ons will include:
    • GPS, Gyro, Compass, accelerometer
    • Speakers
    • HDMI
  • Multiple USB
  • user controlled LEDs and switches
  • footprint of approximately 5-7 inch LCD display

We would really like to hear your opinion. Please send your suggestions to info@inti-innovations.co.uk or visit our website and complete a short poll at:
http://inti-innovations.co.uk/products/inti-media/inti-media-beaglebone.html

Schematics will be released under GPL once the design is completed.
hopobject.shortdesc: We have now started a new project, an expansion board for Beaglebone and would like to hear your opinion.
